summary: A day in the life of a Parisian housewife/prostitute, interspersed with musings on the Vietnam War and other contemporary issues.
cast: Marina Vlady|Anny Duperey|Roger Montsoret|Raoul Lévy|Jean Narboni|Yves Beneyton|Juliet Berto|Helena Bielicic|Christophe Bourseiller|Marie Bourseiller|Marie Cardinal|Robert Chevassu|Joseph Gehrard|Jean-Luc Godard|Blandine Jeanson|Benjamin Jules-Rosette|Jean-Pierre Laverne|Jean-Patrick Lebel|Anna Manga|Claude Miller|Hélène Scott
title: 2 ou 3 choses que je sais d'elle
